item.title: Tourism’s Carbon Emissions Grow At More Than Twice That Of Global Economy
item.description: Between 2009 and 2020 the carbon emissions from tourism increased by 3.5% while those from rest of global economy grew by 1.5%.

item.title: Building On An Innovation Legacy Toward A Sustainable Future
item.description: With 50 years of expertise, PETRONAS is fostering and fortifying innovation ecosystems toward achieving a lower-carbon tomorrow.
